text: قل انى لن يجيرنى من الله احد ولن اجد من دونه ملتحدا

translations.translation: Say: 'No one can protect me from Allah and I will never find any refuge apart from Him -
Say: "No one can save me from God, nor can I find a place of refuge apart from Him,
Say: “None can protect me from Allah, nor can I find a refuge apart from Him.
Say, "No one can protect me from God, nor can I find any place of refuge but with him.
Say, “No one will ever save me from Allah, and other than Him, I will not find any refuge.”
Say: "None can protect me from Allah's punishment, nor can I find refuge except in Him."
Say: Surely no one can protect me against Allah, nor can I find besides Him any place of refuge:
Say: 'From God shall protect me not anyone, and I shall find, apart from Him, no refuge,
Say: Lo! none can protect me from Allah, nor can I find any refuge beside Him
Say, "Surely no one can protect me against God, nor can I find besides Him any place of refuge.
Say thou: 'verily none can protect me from Allah, nor can I find beside Him any refuge.
Say, ‘Neither can anyone shelter me from Allah, nor can I find any refuge besides Him.
Say: "No one can deliver me from Allah (If I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him,
Say (O Muhammad SAW): "None can protect me from Allah's punishment (if I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him.
Say: 'None shall protect me from Allah, and other than Him, I will find no refuge,
Say, “No one can protect me from God, and I will not find any refuge except with Him.
Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
[72:22] Say: ‘Indeed none shall protect me from God, from His chastisement, were I to disobey Him, and I shall never find besides Him, that is, other than Him, any refuge.

(Say) to them, Muhammad: (Lo! none can protect me from Allah) from Allah's chastisement if I disobey Him, (nor can I find any refuge beside Him) nor can I find any escape or hiding place from Allah's chastisement if I disobey Him.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَداً } معناه مَلجأٌ

translations.translation: And His saying, "I will find no refuge from Him except in Him" - this means that He is the ultimate refuge.

commentaries.author: ابن عربي
commentaries.text:
{ قل إني لن يجيرني } اعتراض مؤكد لنفي الاستطاعة والقدرة عليهم
 أي: لن يجيرني أيضاً { من الله أحد } إن أرادني الله بضرّ أو غواية فيسلطكم أو غيركم عليّ { ولن أجد من دونه ملتحداً } ملجأ وملاذاً ومهرباً ومحيصاً إن أهلكني أو عذّبني على أيديكم أو غيركم
 وإذ لا أملك النفع والضرّ والهداية والغواية لنفسي فكيف أملك لكم شيئاً منها؟

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
لو أراد عذابي { وَلَنْ أَجِدَ } أبداً { مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَداً } [الجن: 22] ملجأً وملاذاً ينقذني من بطشه وعذابه
 لو جرى مشيئته سبحانه على تعذيبي؟!

وبالجملة: لا أملك لكم
 ولا لنفسي ضراً ولا نفعاً
